content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: MS
      operator: exists
    - name: MB
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000188
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error if MS dataset is present and MB dataset is not present.
Outcome:
  Message: The MB dataset is not present when the MS dataset is present.
Rule Type: Domain Presence Check
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0191
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The domain pair uses DOMAIN as an Identifier to group
                  parent records (e.g., MB) from child records (e.g., MS) and enables
                  a dataset-level relationship to be described in RELREC.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Item 1, bullet 5
                Section: '2.6'
              - Cited Guidance: MS is used for representing data from drug susceptibility
                  testing on the organisms identified in MB.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 6.3.5.4
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - MS

json.Description: Trigger error if MS dataset is present and MB dataset is not present.

Outcome.Message: The MB dataset is not present when the MS dataset is present.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The domain pair uses DOMAIN as an Identifier to group parent records (e.g., MB) from child records (e.g., MS) and enables a dataset-level relationship to be described in RELREC.
MS is used for representing data from drug susceptibility testing on the organisms identified in MB.
